title: BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Awarded 5-Year Agreement With Al Khafji Joint Operations
text: 37 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Awarded 5-Year Agreement With Al Khafji Joint Operations Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Snc-Lavalin Group Inc: * SNC-LAVALIN AWARDED A 5-YEAR FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT WITH AL KHAFJI JOINT OPERATIONS, IN SAUDI ARABIA * SNC-LAVALIN - ‍ UNIT IN SAUDI ARABIA AWARDED A 5-YEAR FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT TO PROVIDE IN-KINGDOM GENERAL ENGINEERING SERVICES TO AL KHAFJI JOINT OPERATIONS​ * SNC-LAVALIN - ‍ AGREEMENT WILL COVER BOTH ON-SHORE AND OFF-SHORE ENGINEERING PROJECTS​ * SNC-LAVALIN - ‍ AL KHAFJI JOINT OPERATIONS IS A JOINT OPERATING CO BETWEEN ARAMCO GULF OPERATIONS COMPANY LIMITED AND KUWAIT GULF OIL COMPANY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
